location.sjis: ディックル村 住宅地

portrait_l.name: player
portrait_l.sjis: 親方にケガさせたあの召喚獣を 追いかけなきゃ！
portrait_l.ascii: I gotta follow that Summon Beast that injured Master!

portrait_l.name: player

male.sjis: 村の外に出るんなら 武器を準備してからだな 材料もそろったし、工房に行こう

female.sjis: 村の外に出るんなら 武器を準備してからだね 材料もそろったし、工房に行こう

portrait_l.ascii: I need a weapon if I'm going to leave the village. I have the materials, I just need to craft it.

portrait_l.name: partner
portrait_l.sjis: もう二度とワガハイを ネコ呼ばわりはさせぬからな！
portrait_l.ascii: I won't let you call me a cat ever again!

portrait_l.name: partner
portrait_l.ascii: As you wish. I'll erase you.

portrait_l.name: murno
portrait_l.sjis: これでよかったのかしら

portrait_l.name: murno
portrait_l.sjis: ふたりとも勝負だなんて
portrait_l.ascii: You two! Such a thing as a match

portrait_l.name: murno
portrait_l.sjis: ふたりとも勝負だなんて
portrait_l.ascii: You two! Such a thing as a match

portrait_l.name: murno
portrait_l.sjis: ふたりとも勝負だなんて
portrait_l.ascii: You two! Such a thing as a match

portrait_l.name: elderly
portrait_l.sjis: 近頃の若いヤツはなっとらん 召喚師もそうじゃ、 召喚したらしたで用が済んだら
portrait_l.ascii: Youngsters these days are no good. Summoners too! If they sent their Beasts back when they finished,

portrait_l.name: elderly
portrait_l.sjis: 責任を持って送還すれば はぐれ召喚獣なんて 問題は、おこらん
portrait_l.ascii: there wouldn't be any Stray Summon Beasts.

portrait_l.name: elderly
portrait_l.sjis: 近頃、物騒ですねぇ わたしがこの村に 嫁いでから、うん十年
portrait_l.ascii: It's been really dangerous lately It's been decades since I came to this village,

portrait_l.name: elderly
portrait_l.sjis: こんなに、はぐれが 暴れる事は、初めてです
portrait_l.ascii: but this is the first time I have seen Strays this out of control.
